metadata.synopsis: As we enter the creche, Daisy warns us to stay away from the githyanki - they want the artefact and will stop at nothing to take it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Walk through monastery doors in CRE.

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *Within the artefact, a feeling stirs - uncertainty.*
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy speaks to player as voice in head. Player might touch head in mind meld style to suggest this.

0.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
0.text: Your curiosity is getting the better of you - do not let it. Stay away from the githyanki.

1.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
1.text: They're hunting you. They want the artefact. They'll stop at nothing to take it from you.
